item.description: A cpu is like a big truck. You can load it with a lot of different things, some very heavy but you can only drive one single route.
A Supercomputer is a subset of really powrful HPC systems HPC is a larger umbrella term encompasses wide raneg of scenarios such as DNA sequencing, av driving, stock trading
Semiconductors are manufactured on silicon wafers — older nodes used 200mm diameter wafers and newer nodes (after ~2000) use 300mm diameter wafers.

Unlike traditional computers, supercomputers use more than one CPU CPUs grouped into compute noes Comprising a processor or group of processors (symmetric multiprocessing) and a memory block Supercomputer contains 10k thousands of nodes Interconnect allows nodes to collab on solving a specifcic problem Supercomputing is measured in floating-point operations per second (FLOPS) Petfalops: measure of computer’s processing speed equal to a thousand trillion flops 1 - petaflop computer system can perform one quadrillion flops Supercomputing refers to the process of complex calculations used by supercomputers HPC is the use of multiple supercomputing
